body.p: The agent settings are based on a classic key/value mechanism.

It reads its settings differently depending on the operating system:
Windows: with the registry keys located at KEY_LOCAL_MACHINE/SOFTWARE/FusionInventory-Agent
MacOSX: the configuration file is located in /opt/fusionInventory-agent/agent.cfg
UNIX/Linux: on UNIX/Linux, the agent expects its configuration to be here /etc/fusioninventory/agent.cfg
prebuilt: if you use a prebuilt package, the agent.cfg configuration is in the packages' root directory.
